positions.subtitle: Philips Electronics India Ltd.
positions.description: As a Project Leader, I am responsible for leading teams on projects, addressing both technical and managerial aspects of the project. Other key responsibilities include:•  Managing communication interface with partners located at different sites• Planning and tracking resources on the project.• Technically leading the project design and architecture • Participating in requirement analysis and management, design and implementation of embedded/PC based software projects specifically using C/C++.
positions.title: Project Leader
positions.description_html:
As a Project Leader, I am responsible for leading teams on projects, addressing both technical and managerial aspects of the project.

Other key responsibilities include:

• Managing communication interface with partners located at different sites
• Planning and tracking resources on the project.
• Technically leading the project design and architecture
• Participating in requirement analysis and management, design and implementation of embedded/PC based software projects specifically using C/C++.
